description: This file contains unit tests for the FrameType class template, testing buffer operations, copy, and reading/writing functionalities using Google Test framework.

classes.name: FrameType
classes.description: A templated class representing a data frame with buffer management, supporting read/write and copy operations.

methods.name: SetBuffer
methods.description: Sets a buffer segment of the frame to the provided data.

methods.name: GetBuffer
methods.description: Retrieves a buffer segment from the frame into the provided array.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Sets or gets the size of the frame.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears the frame data and resets state.
